description.long: Any doubt that a piece of furniture like the Genoa Sofa Bed can give a new look to your space? Whether in the living room, office, or bedroom, it adapts very well to your needs and adds a charming touch to the environment. The cozy structure combined with the tapered legs is great for you to sit, watch TV, read a book, or unwind in your daily life. But if you need to take a nap or have guests at home, just unzip the zippers that store the legs to turn it into a bed. Cool, right? Oh, it also has this beautiful blue color to be the final touch of the decor.

Boasting a look that promises to bring sophistication and coziness to your home, the Premium Sofa Bed will renew your days of rest and is a piece worthy of compliments in any decor. Inside, it features reforested wood in its composition, a great characteristic for daily use. On the outside, the suede makes everyone want to stay on it indefinitely, enhancing your leisure moments in front of the TV. And to top it all off, it quickly transforms from sofa to bed to adapt to your routine and needs. Many benefits for a home that deserves to be equally amazing.

A simple piece of furniture like the Córsega Sofa Bed has the ability to transform your space, no matter where you choose to place it. Combining an elegant structure with tapered legs, it serves both as a cozy spot for lounging in front of the TV or reading a book and as a bed for overnight guests. To convert it into a bed, just unzip the compartments that store the legs. How great is that? Plus, the gray color and upholstery details add even more charm to your home style.

A practical way to enhance the receptiveness of your home, the Venice Sofa Bed is also a great ally for decorating your rooms! Perfect for spaces ranging from the living room to the office, it features a design with simple lines and slightly angled legs. The striking color is ideal for complementing the space and making it the star of the room—plus, the stitched finish on the seat and backrest is another elegant highlight worth mentioning. Whether it's bringing comfort to your daily routine or hosting friends over the weekend, it fits perfectly into a movie session or a chat in its original position, and with a few adjustments, it transforms into an extra bed for additional guests. All this versatility will turn your home into a safe haven where you can relax and recharge for the next day—features that everyone desires.

Cozy and welcoming, the Solomons Retractable Sofa without Box is perfect for making your home more comfortable. Built with durable materials, it features a seat and backrest filled with foam and loose cushions with silicone padding, providing excellent comfort and coziness. In addition to being inviting and convertible into a sofa bed, this piece is ideal for smaller spaces as it is a boxless type, optimizing the available room space and freeing up more circulation area. All of this is complemented by a clean and elegant design that highlights its timeless color, sure to make your corner flawless and worthy of many compliments.

description.short: 3-seater sofa, retractable and reclining, natural linen
description.long: With numerous structural advantages and an eye-catching design, the Lupin Sofa is the perfect blend of comfort and beauty. The first highlight is the casters, which make the piece easily adaptable to the space and simplify the task of rearranging the living room. The combination of high-density foam with a retractable seat and reclining backrest offers the perfect balance for those moments when you need a more complete rest or when hosting guests. Boasting an elegant look that harmoniously integrates with the room's decor, it is also reinforced by a solid wood frame, which adds durability and perfect security to your routine. This way, you can always count on a cozy and well-furnished spot to enjoy relaxing moments.

Welcoming with coziness and good taste will be an easy task with the Belgrado Sofa in your home! Built with reforested eucalyptus wood, it features elastic webbing and springs in its construction, ensuring a firmer and more comfortable piece. On the outside, the sofa is upholstered in linen, which adds aesthetic value to your decor. And we can't forget to mention the chaise, the part of the sofa with greater depth, perfect for stretching your legs and relaxing.

To promote coziness and well-being in your favorite corners, rely on the cushions that embrace your body and the softness of the suede that only the Blenda Sofa can offer. With its straight lines and timeless color, it's perfect for adding the missing charm to your home style while accommodating family and friends for a pleasant chat on a late afternoon or a movie session on the weekend. To top it off, it also features a retractable seat for a more complete relaxation experience and a reclining backrest that makes that post-lunch nap much more comfortable.

Cozy moments and a complete living room await you with the Berna Sofa! Constructed from eucalyptus wood, which provides excellent reinforcement for everyday use, the piece features elastic webbing, a fixed backrest with silicone fiber, and a retractable seat with D26 foam. On the outside, it is upholstered in linen with a color that adds beauty and good taste to your space's decor. Whether for hosting guests or stretching out during rest periods, it will be indispensable in your routine.

description.short: Rectangular solid wood dining table, 160 cm
description.long: Inspired by the beauty and grandeur of the fruit-bearing palm, the Macaúba Dining Table will be the centerpiece of your dining room. With a natural and robust appearance, the piece highlights the solid wood structure, which not only provides excellent stability but also ensures greater durability—the varnish finish protects against moisture and makes cleaning easier. Made with straight lines and thick wood, the table accommodates up to 6 seats and brings a cozy, country or beach house vibe to your space, making your city corner more welcoming and charming. You can then pair it with good chairs or, if you prefer, also purchase the matching bench.

description.short: Round dining table with glass top, 100 cm
description.long: The Isabela Table is an essential item for your routine, whether for daily meals or for gatherings with family and friends. With a glass top and elegant structure, it is easy to coordinate with other essential furniture and provides excellent support when you need to set out plates, cutlery, and glasses to welcome everyone with warmth. Note that the piece does not include chairs, which should be purchased separately for complete use.

description.short: Rectangular dining table with glass top, 130 cm
description.long: Your dining room or kitchen needs to be well-equipped to make gathering moments even more special, whether for daily use or entertaining friends on various occasions. The Agata model is the ideal choice for this! Thanks to its spacious top, you'll be able to comfortably accommodate all the necessary meal elements, such as plates, glasses, cutlery, and trays. And since an ideal home style also includes beautiful décor, the design of the piece helps to elevate the room's sophistication. The wooden base, combined with the sober-colored top with rounded edges and glass finish, adds an elegant touch to your space. Now just add the dream chairs and enjoy a perfect home

There's no denying it: the dining table is one of the few pieces of furniture that truly brings the family together—after all, who doesn't enjoy savoring a good meal alongside their loved ones? To ensure your space looks impeccable, rely on the Stanford Table. This model draws inspiration from the industrial style with its black carbon steel base and brown top, while also offering a range of possibilities for creatively coordinating with your dining room or kitchen. But the benefits don't stop there! The open sides and prominent straight lines add sophistication to the room, and you can also pair it with other pieces from the Stanford Line for a complete look. Note that the piece does not include chairs, which should be purchased separately for full use.

description.short: Round extendable dining table with MDF top
description.long: There's nothing like maximizing the potential of our home, right? With the Fresta Extendable Table, you not only get a piece of furniture with a solid wood structure that is resistant and durable, but you also optimize your dining room. When closed, it accommodates up to 4 people, making it perfect for daily use. When guests arrive, you can easily extend it to add 25 cm to the tabletop, ensuring everyone is comfortable. The wood's finish with a varnished coating adds natural beauty to the decor and also makes daily cleaning easier. Then just add some great chairs to complete the room.

Being well-accommodated in an organized environment greatly enhances daily productivity, did you know? That is why the Anah Office Desk is a great ally for your work or study hours. With its spacious top, it allows you to arrange essential items like your laptop, notebook, stationery, and even a small organizer to keep smaller objects within reach. Versatile, the desk features an industrial look that highlights its black structure and wood-finished top, making it an ideal addition to any decor as it complements everything and adds an extra touch of charm to the space. Now, your home office will not only be functional but also stylish and tasteful!

Being well-accommodated in an organized environment greatly enhances daily productivity, did you know? That is why the Anah Office Desk is a great ally for your work or study hours. With its spacious top, it allows you to arrange essential items like your laptop, notebook, stationery, and even a small organizer to keep smaller objects within reach. Versatile, the desk features an industrial look that highlights its black structure and wood-finished top, making it an ideal addition to any decor as it complements everything and adds an extra touch of charm to the space. Now, your home office will not only be functional but also stylish and tasteful!

You do not need to fill your space with things to create a complete study or home office corner. On the contrary, just choosing the right furniture can make organization a great ally for your productivity! With the Studio Desk, your essential items are neatly arranged on the top, along with decorative pieces that help make the room more inviting. The traditional colors and understated design create a professional and pleasant atmosphere for daily use. Now, just find a chair to perfectly match your desk!

Want to make your office much more functional and complete? How about choosing the Nero L-Shaped Office Desk? Made from durable and high-quality materials, it's perfect for making your workspace much more productive.

Having a beautiful and well-decorated workspace also makes a difference in your daily life, doesn’t it? With the Studio Desk, you bring an industrial trend piece into your environment, which not only adds modernity to the decor but is also easy to match with chairs, bookshelves, and other office elements. The L-shaped design is perfect for those who use a lot of papers or accessories daily, as it keeps everything organized and within reach, ready for use. Then you can just enjoy all this to produce more and better.

With 2 doors and 6 drawers, there will be no shortage of space for clothing, accessories, cosmetics, and even bedding – everything finds an ideal spot in the internal compartments. Made with quality materials, the piece features a UV paint finish, a technology that ensures greater protection and durability.

With 3 doors and 2 drawers, it has compartments for long garments on hangers, foldable clothes, and even toiletries or bedding, thanks to the shelves. The UV-painted wood finish not only ensures a beautiful piece of furniture but also enhances durability. The mirror adds an elegant and visually spacious touch to the room. Speaking of space, the sliding doors on aluminum tracks help you make the most of the available area as they don’t take up extra space when opened. This way, keeping your room organized becomes easy!

The New Conect Wardrobe has the perfect space to accommodate all your belongings in an organized manner, whether in the 3 drawers or the 4 doors. It also features an external niche for small items. On the outside, it offers a perfect look for those seeking a neutral piece of furniture that complements other furnishings in the room without stealing the spotlight.

With 2 doors, 3 drawers, and internal compartments that accommodate your clothes, personal items, shoes, and accessories, it keeps everything organized and easy to reach during wardrobe changes, so you won't lose sight of what's important. On the outside, it features a classic charm with a sober color that perfectly harmonizes with the rest of the furniture, allowing you to focus on enjoying your relaxing space and recharging for the next day.

The Studio Wardrobe is a versatile solution perfect for transforming your bedroom into a well-organized and charming space. As a closet-type unit, it can be used alone or combined with other modules, allowing you to create a personalized piece of furniture that meets your specific needs. In addition to its great functionality, it features a modern design thanks to the combination of materials and industrial style, not to mention the color that adds a touch of taste to the room's decor. All these features make it an essential addition to make your daily routine more enjoyable and truly complete. Just choose the spot where it will shine and enjoy an impeccable home-style setup.

Equipped with 6 doors and 2 drawers, it has compartments for clothing, shoes, accessories, cosmetics, and even organizer boxes - everything to ensure that essential items for your routine are always within reach. Additionally, its robust look with a traditional color for this type of furniture adds sophistication and style to your space's decor.

With ample storage space provided by 2 doors and 3 drawers, it accommodates your clothing, shoes, accessories, or other personal items well, making your routine more practical. On the outside, the mirror is a helpful ally for checking makeup, hair, or your daily look. All of this comes with a classic design for this type of furniture and a neutral color that complements any style of decor, helping you create the home-style of your dreams.

description.short: Complete kitchen cabinet, box with counter and glass upper cabinet
description.long: With ample storage space provided by its doors and drawers, it accommodates your utensils well and makes your routine more practical. On the outside, it features a classic design for this type of furniture and a neutral color that complements any style of decor, helping you create the home-style of your dreams.

The Lugano Wardrobe features drawers for folded clothes, while the hangers keep long and delicate items wrinkle-free. The other compartments support comforters, towels, travel bags, organizer boxes, and anything else you need to keep nearby to simplify your routine. Speaking of convenience, the mirror on the door is a versatile detail that helps you check every aspect of your look. With a sober color and classic structure, it also serves as a decor ally and, thanks to the sliding doors, helps you make the most of your bedroom space.

Com 3 portas e 4 gavetas, esse guarda-roupa é construído em MDF resistente, corrediças telescópicas e puxadores em alumínio, este modelo ainda conta com espelho de corpo inteiro, que amplia o espaço e proporciona praticidade no dia a dia. Além da usabilidade, o móvel carrega um design elegante que destaca a cor sóbria e a caixaria robusta. Ah, as portas de correr têm sistema anti descarrilhamento para garantir a segurança na rotina.

Functional and perfect for various areas of the home, chairs are pieces of furniture that require a cozy structure and beautiful design - everything you find in the Charles Eames Chair. Besides its very traditional design in the world of design that offers greater comfort during activities, the piece also comes in a color that easily harmonizes with the rest of the furniture. All this contributes to allowing you to enjoy more time with your guests or family and to create a captivating home-style.

With a contemporary design that flirts with a minimalist style, the Mona Chair Set will look amazing in your home-style. Besides enhancing the environment with its steel structure in black paint and the neutral linen upholstery, it also offers superb comfort with a seat and backrest padded with foam of the ideal density. Oh, did you notice the synthetic fabric detail? It adds a touch of taste to your space.

Perfect for the dining room of your dreams, the Tiva Set is not only functional but also adds a touch of sophisticated design to your space. While the sturdy structure, foam padding, and linen upholstery provide all the necessary comfort, the 2 pieces feature timeless colors and a wood-finished look, creating the ideal combination to fill your space with taste and elegance.

In addition to serving for meals, chairs also add a stylish touch to the decor, such as the Windsor model. With a modern design, the four pieces feature wooden legs for stability and an open-back design that adds a unique touch to your home decor, while remaining easy to match with other furniture. They can fit into various environments, whether it's the dining room, living room, or even accompany your vanity. All of this allows you to enjoy quality time with your guests or family.

In addition to serving for meals, chairs also add a stylish touch to the decor, such as the Windsor model. With a modern design, the four pieces feature wooden legs for stability and an open-back design that adds a unique touch to your home decor, while remaining easy to match with other furniture. They can fit into various environments, whether it's the dining room, living room, or even accompany your vanity. All of this allows you to enjoy quality time with your guests or family.

Perfect for the dining room of your dreams, the Masters Allegra Set is not only functional but also adds a touch of sophisticated design to your space. While the sturdy frame, foam padding, and linen upholstery provide all the necessary comfort, the two pieces feature timeless coloring and a wood-like finish, creating the perfect combination to make your space full of taste and refinement.

Inspired by elegant 19th-century Parisian furniture and designed for maximum comfort, the Ávila Chair combines style and functionality in a unique way. Built from solid wood, it features curvilinear details that add softness and delicacy to the piece. Its varnished finish makes it a standout piece, offering durability and reliability. The upholstered seat provides ideal comfort and adds a touch of class to any room. Its versatile design allows it to be placed in dining rooms, living rooms, waiting areas, bedrooms, entry halls, and kitchens, opening doors to your imagination.

If you're looking for comfort, elegance, and practicality, the Melina Upholstered Chair will exceed all your expectations. It offers great convenience and optimizes space, while easily harmonizing with your decor style. It can be used in living rooms, dining areas, and kitchens, adding a special touch to your decoration. Its design will soften your space without going unnoticed, bringing more lightness and warmth to your home. Constructed from carbon steel, it beautifully contrasts with the upholstered backrest and seat, which are extremely comfortable, durable, and cozy.
Constructed from carbon steel, it beautifully contrasts with the upholstered backrest and seat, which are extremely comfortable, durable, and cozy.

With a contemporary design that flirts with minimalist style, the Lia Chair will look fantastic in your home decor. Not only does it enhance the environment with its iron frame painted in black epoxy and graphite-colored linen upholstery, but it also offers superb comfort, thanks to its seat and backrest padded with foam of ideal densities to support each specific part of the body. Versatile, this piece can complement various spaces, from the dining room to the living room or office—certainly, the open-frame structure will add an extra touch of charm to your space.

The Anah Desk is a great ally for your work or study hours. With a spacious top, it allows you to accommodate essential items such as a laptop, notebook, stationery, and even a small organizer, while the drawer is essential for keeping smaller objects within reach. Versatile, this piece features an industrial look that highlights its black structure and wood-finished top, making it an ideal addition to any decor as it complements everything and adds an extra touch of charm to the space.

description.short: 150cm desk with a 30mm MDF top and matte finish
description.long: Structured in steel and MDF, the beautiful Studio Desk is perfect for your study or work nook. With ample desktop space, it efficiently accommodates your laptop and other essentials like a desk lamp and pen holder. In addition to its functionality, the clean design with a sober and timeless tone gives a minimalist touch to the room and makes it easy to match with other home office furniture. Just add the perfect chair, and enjoy your productive space.

With ample space to accommodate a laptop, notebook, lamp, and other essential materials for your routine, the Mendes model also features drawers for those smaller items that might get lost if left loose. While all this functionality makes day-to-day life more practical, the design enhances aesthetics: a classic color, simple structure, and details that make the decor even more special and tasteful, just the way you deserve.
